item.title: Canelo Vs. Crawford Results: Boxing World Reacts To ‘Bud’s Big Win
item.description: Terence Crawford stuns Canelo Alvarez to win the undisputed super middleweight titles in Las Vegas. See reactions, scorecards, and full fight results.

item.title: Don’t Miss A Perfect ‘Diamond In The Sky’ On Tuesday — When To See It
item.description: On Sept. 16, skywatchers can spot a cosmic diamond as the crescent moon, Jupiter, Castor and Pollux come to an apparent alignment in the pre-dawn sky.

item.title: AI And (Dis)Ability: Unlocking Human Potential With Technology
item.description: For too long, assistive technology has been clunky, stigmatizing and one-size-fits-all. AI is changing that narrative, one prosocial application after...

item.title: When To See A Dramatic ‘Planet Parade’ This Week As Worlds Align
item.description: September's planetary parade features five planets, three of them visible to the naked eye. Here’s when and where to look this week, Sept. 15-21, 2025...

item.title: ‘The Witcher’ Season 4 Gets First Trailer With Liam Hemsworth And An October Release Date
item.description: Toss a coin to your new Witcher. Here's your first look at Liam Hemsworth as he takes over for Henry Cavill as Geralt of Rivia.
